name: Postpartum Care Interview Protocol
description: Comprehensive interview protocol for understanding postpartum care experiences, recovery, mental health, and transition to parenthood.

questions.text: Can you tell me about yourself and how long ago you gave birth?
follow_up_prompts: How has life changed since the baby arrived?
Who is helping you at home?
What has been the biggest adjustment?

questions.text: Can you describe your birth experience? How did it go?
follow_up_prompts: Was it what you expected?
Did you have any complications?
How did the medical team support you?

questions.text: How has your physical recovery been since giving birth?
follow_up_prompts: Have you experienced any pain or discomfort?
How is your energy level?
Have you had any concerns about healing?

questions.text: Have you had postpartum checkups with your healthcare provider? What was that like?
follow_up_prompts: When was your first postpartum visit?
Did you feel your concerns were addressed?
Are you able to schedule follow-up care?

questions.text: How have you been feeling emotionally since giving birth?
follow_up_prompts: Have you experienced mood changes or anxiety?
Have you been screened for postpartum depression?
Do you have someone you can talk to about your feelings?

questions.text: How are you feeding your baby? Can you tell me about that experience?
follow_up_prompts: Are you breastfeeding, formula feeding, or both?
Have you had any challenges with feeding?
Did you receive lactation support if needed?

questions.text: How much sleep are you getting? How are you managing fatigue?
follow_up_prompts: Is the baby sleeping in stretches?
Do you have help during the night?
How is lack of sleep affecting you?

questions.text: What kind of support do you have during this postpartum period?
follow_up_prompts: Is your partner/family helping?
Do you have access to childcare support?
Are you connected with other new parents?

questions.text: How is your baby doing? Have you had any concerns about the baby's health?
follow_up_prompts: Has the baby had pediatric checkups?
Are vaccinations up to date?
Have you had access to pediatric care when needed?

questions.text: How have your relationships changed since the baby was born?
follow_up_prompts: How is your relationship with your partner?
Have you maintained connections with friends?
Do you feel isolated or supported?

questions.text: Have you thought about or returned to work? What are your plans?
follow_up_prompts: Do you have maternity leave?
What childcare arrangements have you made?
How do you feel about balancing work and parenting?

questions.text: Have you discussed contraception or family planning with your healthcare provider?
follow_up_prompts: Are you using any form of birth control?
Did you receive counseling about contraception options?
Do you have plans for future pregnancies?

questions.text: What resources or services have been helpful during your postpartum period?
follow_up_prompts: Have you accessed support groups or classes?
Do you know where to find help if needed?
What additional support would be helpful?

questions.text: Overall, how would you describe your postpartum experience so far?
follow_up_prompts: What has been the hardest part?
What has brought you the most joy?
If you could change one thing, what would it be?

metadata.author: Synthetic Gravidas Research Team
metadata.target_population: Women in the postpartum period (up to 1 year after birth)
